level_gen_program:
%%% Game played on an 8x6 grid
setting(grid_width(8)).
setting(grid_height(6)).
setting(row(1..H)) :- setting(grid_height(H)).
setting(col(1..W)) :- setting(grid_width(W)).

%%% Time bound: 30 steps
setting(time_bound(30)).

%%% Player and flag are randomly placed (but not too close)
1 { at(R,C,player) : setting(row(R)), setting(col(C)) } 1.
1 { at(R,C,flag) : setting(row(R)), setting(col(C)) } 1.
distance(D) :- at(R1,C1,player), at(R2,C2,flag),
    D = |R1-R2| + |C1-C2|.
:- distance(D), D <= 3.
%%% Randomize level generation
#heuristic at(RANDINT(1,6),RANDINT(1,8),player). [10,true]
#heuristic at(RANDINT(1,6),RANDINT(1,8),flag). [10,true]

decorate(game_type,grid).
decorate(label,flag,f).
decorate(label,player,p).
player_plan_program:
plan(landmark(1,H-1,W-1)) :- observe(at(R,C,player)),
    setting(grid_height(H)), setting(grid_width(W)).
plan(landmark(2,2,2)).
plan(landmark(3,H-1,W-1)) :- observe(at(R,C,player)),
    setting(grid_height(H)), setting(grid_width(W)).
player_move_program:
do(move(down)) :- observe(at(R1,C1,player)), memory(at(R2,C2,flag)), R1 < R2.
do(move(up)) :- observe(at(R1,C1,player)), memory(at(R2,C2,flag)), R1 > R2.
do(move(right)) :- observe(at(R,C1,player)), memory(at(R,C2,flag)), C1 < C2.
do(move(left)) :- observe(at(R,C1,player)), memory(at(R,C2,flag)), C1 > C2.

do(move(down)) :- observe(at(R1,C1,player)),
    not memory(at(_,_,flag)),
    not memory(reached_landmark(I)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : plan(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I;
    plan(landmark(I,R2,C2)), R1 < R2.
do(move(up)) :- observe(at(R1,C1,player)),
    not memory(at(_,_,flag)),
    not memory(reached_landmark(I)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : plan(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I;
    plan(landmark(I,R2,C2)), R1 > R2.
do(move(right)) :- observe(at(R,C1,player)),
    not memory(at(_,_,flag)),
    not memory(reached_landmark(I)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : plan(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I;
    plan(landmark(I,R,C2)), C1 < C2.
do(move(left)) :- observe(at(R,C1,player)),
    not memory(at(_,_,flag)),
    not memory(reached_landmark(I)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : plan(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I;
    plan(landmark(I,R,C2)), C1 > C2.

remember(reached_landmark(I)) :-
    observe(at(R,C,player)), plan(landmark(I,R,C)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : plan(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I.

remember(at(R,C,flag)) :- observe(at(R,C,flag)).
memory(X) :- remember(X).
visibility_program:
%%% 'Fog-of-war' is a ring of one around the player
observe(fog(R1,C1)) :-
    setting(row(R1)), setting(col(C1)),
    at(R2,C2,player), |C1-C2| >= 2.
observe(fog(R1,C1)) :-
    setting(row(R1)), setting(col(C1)),
    at(R2,C2,player), |R1-R2| >= 2.
observe(at(R,C,O)) :- at(R,C,O), not observe(fog(R,C)).
nature_program:
%%% Player can do at most one action per time step
:- do(X), do(Y), X != Y.

%%% Move around
next(R,C,player) :- at(R,C,player), not do(move(_)).
next(R+1,C,player) :- at(R,C,player), do(move(down)), R < H, setting(grid_height(H)).
next(R,C,player) :- at(R,C,player), do(move(down)), setting(grid_height(R)).
next(R-1,C,player) :- at(R,C,player), do(move(up)), R > 1.
next(1,C,player) :- at(1,C,player), do(move(up)).
next(R,C+1,player) :- at(R,C,player), do(move(right)), C < W, setting(grid_width(W)).
next(R,C,player) :- at(R,C,player), do(move(right)), setting(grid_width(C)).
next(R,C-1,player) :- at(R,C,player), do(move(left)), C > 1.
next(R,1,player) :- at(R,1,player), do(move(left)).

%%% Flag stays in place
next(R,C,flag) :- at(R,C,flag).
goal_program:
%%% Goal: reach the flag
win :- at(R,C,player), at(R,C,flag).
%%% You lose if time runs out..
lose(timeout) :- current_time(T), setting(time_bound(S)), T > S.
level_settings:
setting(grid_width(8)).
setting(grid_height(6)).
setting(time_bound(30)).
setting(row(1)).
setting(row(2)).
setting(row(3)).
setting(row(4)).
setting(row(5)).
setting(row(6)).
setting(col(1)).
setting(col(2)).
setting(col(3)).
setting(col(4)).
setting(col(5)).
setting(col(6)).
setting(col(7)).
setting(col(8)).
decorate(game_type,grid).
decorate(label,flag,f).
decorate(label,player,p).
